attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the government was to charge an immigration tax of £1000 per immigrant, it would assure that the immigrant had some money to pay their own way in life. plus it would help to curb the immigration disaster this 'once great' britain is facing.

rejection.details: Please limit your use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
